Description:
[h1]Air Racing But Harder[/h1]
A storm has invaded the air race map and sent the original course into shambles. Prepare to have all aspects of your aerial control challenged in this beefed up version of the air race map. If you haven't already, make sure to try out the original version of the map [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2204381361]here[/url]

*Time trial mode in the map is temporarily broken. For the time being, only play the map in race mode for multiplayer matches.
[hr][/hr]
[h1][url=https://discord.com/invite/CVmFzn4]Join the Air Race Discord![/url][/h1]

• Over 1,300 members and plenty of people to race with
• Weekly Multiplayer Tournaments with cash prize pools & multiplayer setup guides
• Leaderboards with videos of the fastest players' laps & more
